au_644025: sudo apt-get update

au_52693: sudo apt-get install testdisk
sudo photorec /dev/loop0
[proceed]
[none] (partition type table)
P ext4 [search]
[ext2/ext3]
[free] (or I guess you could use [whole])

sudo mkdir -p /media/win
sudo mount /dev/sda1 /media/win #change /dev/sda1 for your own partition
sudo mount -o loop /media/win/ubuntu/disks/root.disk /mnt

au_787084: sudo apt-get install foremost

sudo foremost -w /dev/sr0

|********************************************|

sudo foremost all /dev/sr0
Processing: /dev/sr0
|********************************************|

sudo chmod -R 777 ~/output/
